org.drinkless.tdlib

类 Log

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.drinkless.tdlib.Log

  • public final class Log
extends java.lang.Object
    Class used for managing internal TDLib logging. Use TdApi.*Log* methods instead.

    • 构造器概要

      构造器 
      构造器和说明
      Log() 

    • 方法概要

    • 构造器详细资料

    • 方法详细资料

      • setVerbosityLevel

        @Deprecated
public static void setVerbosityLevel(int verbosityLevel)
        已过时。 As of TDLib 1.4.0 in favor of TdApi.SetLogVerbosityLevel, to be removed in the future.
        Changes TDLib log verbosity.
        参数:
        verbosityLevel - New value of log verbosity level. Must be non-negative. Value 0 corresponds to fatal errors, value 1 corresponds to java.util.logging.Level.SEVERE, value 2 corresponds to java.util.logging.Level.WARNING, value 3 corresponds to java.util.logging.Level.INFO, value 4 corresponds to java.util.logging.Level.FINE, value 5 corresponds to java.util.logging.Level.FINER, value greater than 5 can be used to enable even more logging. Default value of the log verbosity level is 5.

      • setFilePath

        @Deprecated
public static boolean setFilePath(java.lang.String filePath)
        已过时。 As of TDLib 1.4.0 in favor of TdApi.SetLogStream, to be removed in the future.
        Sets file path for writing TDLib internal log. By default TDLib writes logs to the System.err. Use this method to write the log to a file instead.
        参数:
        filePath - Path to a file for writing TDLib internal log. Use an empty path to switch back to logging to the System.err.
        返回:
        whether opening the log file succeeded.

      • setMaxFileSize

        @Deprecated
public static void setMaxFileSize(long maxFileSize)
        已过时。 As of TDLib 1.4.0 in favor of TdApi.SetLogStream, to be removed in the future.
        Changes the maximum size of TDLib log file.
        参数:
        maxFileSize - The maximum size of the file to where the internal TDLib log is written before the file will be auto-rotated. Must be positive. Defaults to 10 MB.
